column1: The city of Altamonte Springs' public schools are a part of Seminole County Public Schools. Altamonte Springs is served by 5 public elementary schools (K–5); 2 public middle school (6–8); and 2 public high school (9–12). The city of Altamonte Springs is also home to a branch of Seminole State College of Florida. Additionally
column2: Altamonte Springs boasts 10 percent more college graduates per capita than the Florida average
column3: and is just a few miles away from the University of Central Florida and Rollins College.
